plot: An actress is under the powerful influence of two men - her husband and her director. While she is rehearsing the role of a lifetime, Ophelia from Shakespeare's Hamlet, she starts to lose her own sense of reality.
title: En mi memoria queda guardado
plot_es: An actress is under the powerful influence of two men - her husband and her director. While she is rehearsing the role of a lifetime, Ophelia from Shakespeare's Hamlet, she starts to lose her own sense of reality.
plot_en: An actress is under the powerful influence of two men - her husband and her director. While she is rehearsing the role of a lifetime, Ophelia from Shakespeare's Hamlet, she starts to lose her own sense of reality.
